title: Rohan Is Mine (4R172)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot Saruman or an [Isengard] Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns bearer to a skirmish, exert each ally.
Lore:	”'You have no power here, Gandalf the Grey.'”
Rarity:	R
